msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'TOMCAT_4_1_4'.

author: remm
msg: - Add buffer reuse, as was described some time ago, using the state object.
- Existing test suites and the administration webapp appear to be working ok,
so I am committing it to see if it causes problems.

author: remm
msg: - Add some new methods to more intelligently allocate the buffers.

author: remm
msg: - Add one extra method to allow reusing.

author: remm
msg: - Add back the code to reset the buffer when an unexpected exception
occurs. This code was commented out in version 1.16.
- Otherwise, the response is always committed and this breaks error
